rooms.description: Spacious living area with ample natural light. Vastu-aligned to the east side.
Adjacent to kitchen for family meals and gatherings.
Modern, functional design with Vastu placement on the south side.
Cozy master bedroom with attached bathroom and closet. Placed in the north-west corner per Vastu guidelines.
Comfortable guest room located on the west side.
General bathroom accessible from both bedrooms and living area, placed in a less auspicious corner as per Vastu.
Dedicated home office with ample natural light. Placed adjacent to the living room for easy communication and minimal distractions according to local norms.
